author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This main goal for this PR is to update autoSkim for monopole analysis. However, the structure of autoSkim has been updated following the discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37656
   + `autoSkimRunII` is made (clone of current `autoSkim`).
   + autoSkim is now for Run-3. The review and following PR should come when PDs are available.

#### PR validation:
None. No change is expected for the PR test since monopole skim will not change anything in DQM histograms.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
No need of backport.
title: Update monopole autoskim
